_header: Go little book be fearful and quake for dread
_description: John Lydgate, Envoy to Henry VI at the end of the Life of St. Edmund — six stanzas rhyme royal

BodAsh59.First Lines:
Go lytel booke be ferful qwake for dredeffor to appere in any so
                    heghe presenceTo alle þe folke þat þee shal see or
                    hereSubmitte þy self with humble reverence…
BodAsh59.Last Lines:
…Beoþe to his chirche defence and champiounBy cause it is
                    of youre foundacyoun
BodAsh59.Attributed Title: Lenvoye au Roy Henry le sysme (f. 23v)

BodTan347.First Lines:
Go lytel booke be ferful qwake for dredeffor to appere in any so
                    heghe presenceTo alle þe folke þat þee shal see or
                    hereSubmitte þy self with humble reverence…
BodTan347.Last Lines:
…Be to this Chirche dyffence and chaunpyounBe cause it is of
                    your ffundacioun
BodTan347.Attributed Title: Lenvoye au Roy Henry le sysme (f. 23v)

OxfCCC61.First Lines:
Go lytill booke be ferefull quake for dredeffortappere in so High
                    presence…
OxfCCC61.Last Lines:
…Without þat ffauour & supportacionOf goodely reders
                    do correccion

CULEe215.First Lines:
GOo lityll boke be ferfull and quake for dredeffor to appere in so
                    hyȝ presence…
CULEe215.Last Lines:
…Bethe to hys chyrche deffence and champyounBe cause it ys of
                    youre fundacyoun

BLHar367.First Lines:
Go litle boke be ferefull quake for dredefor to appere in any so
                    highe presence…
BLHar367.Last Lines:
…be to the churche defence and championbycawse it is of your
                    foundation
BLHar367.Note: Written by the hand of John Stow.
BLHar367.Attributed Title:
lenvoy au Roy henry lesysme (by scribe, John Stow, f.
                    86v)

BLHar372.First Lines:
Go litel book be ferful quak for dreedfor tappere in so hih
                    presence…
BLHar372.Last Lines:
…Beth to his chirch diffence & champiounBe cause it is of
                    your ffundacioun

BLHar2278.First Lines: GO litel book be ferfful quaak for dredeffor tappere in so hyh presence…
BLHar2278.Last Lines: …Beth to his chyrche Dyffence and ChampiounBe cause yt ys your ffundacioun
BLHar2278.Note: After the fifth stanza “ffinis libri” (rubric and blue, f. 119v) and as heading to the last “Regie” (rubric and blue, f. 119v).

BLHar4826.First Lines:
Goo litel book be feerful quak for dreedfor tapere in so hyh
                    presence…
BLHar4826.Last Lines:
…Beth to his Chirche dyffence and champyounBe cuase it is of
                    your fundacioun

Chetham6709.First Lines:
Goo lytyll Booke be fferefull quake & dreedeffor to Appeere In
                    soo hygh presenceTo all folke that the shall see or ReedeSubmytte thy
                    self with humble ReuerenceTo be refourmyd where men fynde
                    OffenceMekely requeryng voyde of presumpcyonWhere thow faylest to do
                    Correccyon
Chetham6709.Attributed Title:
Explicit quod Wilelmus Cotson / Godde grawnte vs grace / Anno Domini
                        Millesimo . CCCCmo lxxxvto et Ao / Ricardi
                        Tercij post Conquestum secundo finem feci / In Die Sancte Barnabe Apostoli
                        Amen (f. 284)
